website_summaries.verdict: Low price point for a kitten food that does not use chicken by-product meal. Formula aimed specifically at kitten growth.
pros: Same brand offered in adult cat version and wet cat food version
Owners say their pets like the taste, and this food doesn't cause bad breath odors
cons: Individual kibbles are larger than average

customer_reviews.title: The little guys like it
customer_reviews.text: My three cats have been eating this for a while now. One of them has a sensitive stomach, so I have to be careful what I give her to eat. She has never thrown up the Nutro Max. As you can imagine, this makes me happy. When I was first deciding what dry food to feed my cats, I did a side-by-side comparison with about five foods. I would measure 1/2 cup of two foods into separate bowls. The next day I would measure the remainders to find which food they preferred. This was the favorite and I've been giving it to them since then.
customer_reviews.author: C. Gervasio

customer_reviews.title: After 10 years, the cats won't eat it.
customer_reviews.text: I've had my cats on this brand for 10 years and now out of the blue, neither of them will eat it. Didn't want to rate the product too harshly because it might just be my cats. It does seem odd though that neither of them will eat it. Called customer service and they were very concerned and took down serial numbers and expiration dates. Ended up sending me a coupon. Not sure why this happened because it has been a very healthy option for them in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine K. Nordberg

customer_reviews.title: Hey Mikey -- He Likes It!!
customer_reviews.text: My 16 yr-old outdoor cat likes it! He forgets he's "an oldie" and gets finicky at times. He gobbled this dry food without complaint. It's not very hard, and the nuggets are "flat" -- therefore making it easy on his teeth. Glad I tried this. Had never seen nor heard of this senior cat food product. But, I'm glad I did. And I'm sure my old friend does too.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley W.

customer_reviews.title: Cats have recinded their threats.
customer_reviews.text: My cats have developed a game: I buy a small bag of food. They love it. I buy a big bag of food. They whine and refuse to eat until I buy some other small bag. Rinse and repeat. So far the Max Cat is a hit. Bowls aren't as empty as they used to be in the small bag days, but there's positive evidence that the food is being eaten.
customer_reviews.author: nadler369

customer_reviews.title: Recent company purchase, and recipe changed.
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy any more - My cats used to love this. Then about a year ago, around the time of Purina buying out this brand and downgrading the recipe, my cats both developed severs Stomatitis, caused by major lack of nutrients in food and often allergies. This cost hundreds of dollars and both cats had to have their teeth removed. As soon as I transitioned them to a healthy wet and dry diet the ongoing symptoms of Stomatitis vanished. The crap that companies put in cat food is a damn crime!
customer_reviews.author: Nodonn

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Do not Buy Nutro! I had used this product years ago, and recently decided to switch from Blue Buffalo to Nutro. 2/4 of my cats developed hot spots after one month of Nutro, with one cat needing to see the vet. ($200 bill) After researching, I discovered that the formula has been changed over the years. I truly suggest never feeding your pet Nutro products.
customer_reviews.author: SagerGreen

customer_reviews.title: Purrrfectly wonderful!!!
customer_reviews.text: Hi! I am a very spoiled Joshua. My mom used to buy me the indoor cat formula but one of my siblings and I started projectile vomiting. My sister decided to change us to the senior diet (My brother is 7 and I am 17; my sister went with my mom at age 18.) After we started getting this new kibble no more vomiting.
customer_reviews.author: Tory Eastman

customer_reviews.title: and it has a good balance of all the nutrients cats need
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this stuff, and it has a good balance of all the nutrients cats need. Healthy, but still affordable. It's also what our vet recommended we switch her to when we adopted her. She's not an especially picky eater, but I noticed when I was changing her over to this (and mixing half of this with half of her previous food), she'd excitedly eat this first and leave the other stuff to pick at over several hours. If I forget to order it here until we're running low (or if it's temporarily out of stock), it's still easy to find at most pet supply type stores.
customer_reviews.author: Ash B

customer_reviews.title: WHY was this discontinued?
customer_reviews.text: This was a great dry cat food that was high quality and not so extremely expensive. My feral cats were all happy eating it, and their coats were gorgeous. When it was discontinued, I tried the replacement "Wholesome Essentials". Something in it made one of the ferals -- who won't let me near him -- scratch himself constantly and so badly that his whole neck was raw. I had to switch to Iams. Very disappointed. I would have fed this to them forever. Luckily, the little guy with the scratched neck recovered.
customer_reviews.author: LAS

customer_reviews.title: Hole in the middle of each piece!
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this and chews it well because of the shape of the kibble. There's a hole in the middle of each piece so they end up chewing it well. I don't know why other manufacturers don't put a hole in the middle of their kibble pieces helps with digestion problems too because it's chewed up really well!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Childers

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor and shape!
customer_reviews.text: My kitten loved this food. It appeared to me that he was struggling with another brand of kitten food that was shaped like tiny round balls. When I gave him Nutro Max Cat Kitten dry food, he dug in and crunched every bite which he clearly thought was "heavenly." He was having a hard time "getting a bite" out of the tiny balls, sometimes swallowing them whole, but the pieces of Max Cat are larger and irregular shaped--just right for Charlie.
customer_reviews.author: C Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY NUTRO
customer_reviews.text: DO not buy NUTRO products. Recently I switched from Blue Buffalo to Nutro, and 2/4 of my cats developed hot spots, with one cat needing to see the vet. ($200 Bill) I had used Nutro in the past, though after researching, it appears that the formula has been changed. I HIGHLY ADVISE not buying this product for your animals!
customer_reviews.author: SagerGreen

customer_reviews.title: Cats Gave it a Resounding "NO"
customer_reviews.text: I have several cats and as a rule, they are not picky eaters. To the contrary when it comes to dry cat food! I recently purchased a bag of this food and all but one would not even touch it. The one who did, threw it all up minutes later. Maybe the bag was somehow tainted or something but for a group who usually dive in to their kibble, this was definitely a resounding "no" from them.
customer_reviews.author: D. Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Finally! A winner
customer_reviews.text: My cat LOVES this cat food. As a matter of fact, I bought a small bag of one of the "designer" dry food to try, and mixed it with the Nutro Max Cat food in my cat's bowl. I kept wondering why my cat was so messy at feeding time... there was always lots of food scattered on the floor all around the bowl. That is, until I figured out that it was the "healthier", more pricey food that was literally being spit out on the floor... my cat picked it out and ate all the Max Cat! Lol! Needless to say, I will continue to buy this food.
customer_reviews.author: JC05

customer_reviews.title: It's been a life saver and good for keeping the vet bill down
customer_reviews.text: It is very healthy and the cats like it. I rescue older cats who have lost their families due to death or going into nursing homes and they have a wide variety of tastes and this one works well for all of them. Urinary tract infections clear up after eating it and taking antibiotics but don't return on this cat food
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Nutro is Awesome for your Cat
customer_reviews.text: Rare to get this food as it normally has a higher price. As we normally do the chicken. Cats ate it no different than their normal Nutro. We love Nutro as we have seen first hand this food bring dire strays back to full health with excellent coats.
customer_reviews.author: AirHeadReviews

customer_reviews.title: ... time buying this product on here and it's a great price compared to pet co and or petsmart my ...
customer_reviews.text: So this is my second time buying this product on here and it's a great price compared to pet co and or petsmart my cat loves it and it last for 4 months with one cat and now I set up the automatic charge for every four months easy effective worth it
customer_reviews.author: Jermaine Rodrigue.

customer_reviews.title: Cats like it
customer_reviews.text: Not the best ingredients compared to Nutro Essentials, but my cats seem to enjoy this one just as much. The food does seem pretty large to be branded as Kitten and Cat food, as my 1 year old has to take his time chewing each piece because of the size. Overall, cats like it, might buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Chris94

customer_reviews.title: Nutro Max Roasted Chicken Kitten Food
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my kitten so he would eat his food and nit the adult cat food that is set out for my other cats. He loves it! Niw he doesn’t even want the other food. His is better! It is a bit pricey, but has good ingredients. I would recommend this food.
customer_reviews.author: K. Zander

customer_reviews.title: Decent Ingredients
customer_reviews.text: Certainly not the best, but I was searching for a cheaper kibble option, as the Goodlife I was feeding hiked their prices. Interesting thing is that this food is made in the very same town { Franklin, Tenn } , and the ingredients seem decent at this price point . I feed wet canned food to my pets as their primary food , but free feed kibble. Update : 4-22-17 Price hike = star reduction. Nutro just matched Goodlife , forever looking for a quality food that's priced fairly. Purina One will be my next try.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Won’t eat
customer_reviews.text: Not one of my 23 cats would eat this. I have no idea why. I kept putting it out and it was all left in the bowls. Had to throw it all away.
customer_reviews.author: Morrie

customer_reviews.title: Working so far for cat with urinary tract issues.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my senior kitty who has has struvite crystals in the past. She is on a urinary tract diet, but the ingredients aren't the best. This has a similar magnesium and ash content, so I decided to give it a try. I mix it half and half with her urinary food. She really seems to like the taste, and hasn't had any problems with crystals. Now the only problem is the dog wants to eat her food, even though she wouldn't touch the prescription food by itself.
customer_reviews.author: Kara F.

customer_reviews.title: Made All Cats Vomit
customer_reviews.text: While I like Nutro Dog Food, and my dogs have had no issues with it, I thought I would try the cat food as well, unfortunately I hated this product because of the huge mess it caused. My cats seemed to like the flavor, but they started throwing up EVERYWHERE... I have 4 cats, so this isn't just one or two being sensitive to the food, this is actually a problem with this product. I stopped feeding them this and went with Taste of the Wild, once they were on it, the throwing up stopped. Save your time and money, and your cats well-being and just avoid this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly M Collins

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY! Two Cats Developed Hot Spots.
customer_reviews.text: I used Nutro years ago, and recently decided to switch from Blue Buffalo back to Nutro. After one month, 2/4 of my (healthy) cats developed hot spots, with one needing to go the vet ($200!) for further treatment. After researching, it appears the original formula used years ago has been changed. I would highly suggest not using this product, unless you wish to risk having an unwell cat.....
customer_reviews.author: SagerGreen

customer_reviews.title: MY FINICKY FURRY GIRL LOVES THIS!
customer_reviews.text: After the Chinese animal food scare several years ago; I became more aware of what I was feeding my favorite girl. My sister highly recommended both their dog & cat foods. My girl has been loving this for several years now. I'm very impressed that this company noticed that cats have tiny teeth so they inserted a hole in each granule making it much easier for them to chew.
customer_reviews.author: LOUIE

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves it and keeps him pooping like a gorilla
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves it and keeps him pooping like a gorilla. With no stink. What could be better than that? We had a Himi that lived over 17 years eating Nutro. Seriously. Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Hiwatt100

customer_reviews.title: What? I don't know how the flavor is.....
customer_reviews.text: Why am I rating flavor? I'm not going to eat it sorry, lol. I've used this food for my foster cats for years!! Its affordable and the ingredients are okay. Especially if you are on a budget! Realize this food is better quality then quite a few top of the line dog food. Nutro dog food was Nice enough to make it affordable for a light of families that are on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: TheDisabledBeauty

customer_reviews.title: Great Senior Cat Food! Value and Quality
customer_reviews.text: My cat (18 yrs old) loves this food! She fell in love with Nutros indoor senior formula which is so much more expensive, so I was thrilled that she likes this variety too! Nitro makes great food. She cleans her bowl. It doesn't give her digestive problems (other brands have made her throw up). She's doesn't get tired of the flavor. And it's easy for her to eat.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Hope this helpsss 🤙🤙
customer_reviews.text: My cats dig it. Three cats roam this household and they were always fussing at me for food! Makes me wanna bunt them like a dang football.. But bow that I swapped this brand!!! They shut the f*** up after feeding them a lesser amount of food than the other brands. Their fur looks spectacular and I don't have to listen to the angry little turds as often. Love my cats and always have.. now it's just easier to.
customer_reviews.author: Nick W.

customer_reviews.title: A sticky situation...
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this food and the price was comparable to that of my local pet store. The issue is that I was sent a product which was sealed close with what appears to be chewing gum. I'm appalled, but the product itself is always a hit in my home.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Lack

customer_reviews.title: Great price, but not the best option
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my cat who decided she no longer liked her Science Diet dry food that I was buying her. She went on strike and started losing weight. I looked at Nutro because of the different flavors and the price. She started eating her food again, but I noticed that her coat became greasy and she had dandruff. I finished out the bag but decided not to purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: rippleinthewater

customer_reviews.title: It's cat food....No, I don't give the flavor 5⭐s
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why they ask people if the flavor is 5 stars or not. I do not eat it, my cat does. It's an OK cat food but even high dollar supposedly organic and all natural food are bad. I was in I am switching my kids to a raw diet. Something that is not cooked at 500゚ and has a 20 year shelf life.
customer_reviews.author: TheDisabledBeauty

customer_reviews.title: Cats Will Be Cats!
customer_reviews.text: I can't speak to anything about the quality, flavor, scent or nutrition value of this dry food, as neither of my two cats would eat it. Neither is picky, so I was a bit surprised when they each took a bite and left the rest in the bowl I tried again with no luck Don't want it to go to waste, so donating it to our local shelter. Probably not wise to base your decision to purchase it on my review. I bought it originally because it had rec'd many good reviews. They are cats - enough said !😊
customer_reviews.author: Sheila McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Always healthy love auto ship.
customer_reviews.text: Cats love it are are always healthy. Over 30 yrs using Nutro products. I am now using auto ship, and is it nice not having to drive to town to get food for our cats.
customer_reviews.author: David Besson

customer_reviews.title: I've been feeding my cats Max Cat for over a year now.
customer_reviews.text: It's a good brand. Couple of issues I saw in other reviews. 1) Remember to transition a cat slowly to a new diet, mix it with the previous food. If your switch a cat's diet too quickly, they'll get sick.2) This food actually cured my cats' diarrhea. Two of my cats have sensitive stomachs. They can't handle ANY of the usual store brands. 3) My cats also had intestinal parasites as kittens. Be sure to have your cat checked out.
customer_reviews.author: That White Guy

customer_reviews.title: All love this one particular flavor/brand
customer_reviews.text: We have 4 cats, 3 of them are senior cats over 10 yrs old. All love this one particular flavor/brand. I recommend this to all who have finicky cats. My cats all seem to agree and love this particular one. Mrs. Judie St. Augustine, Fl.
customer_reviews.author: Judie & Ed

customer_reviews.title: Great Food for My Sensitive Cat and Her Five Normal Siblings
customer_reviews.text: I have six cats, one of which has a sensitive stomach. I tried this hoping it would be easier on her. All my cats love it, and when it comes to the house, they climb on the box and try to get it open. My sensitive one, Estella, has had no problems with Nutro Max, which makes every day easier for all of us.
customer_reviews.author: A Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Great cat food
customer_reviews.text: My three cats love it and have been eating it for over ten years. I even use it as a treat for them. I've tried Science Diet, Iams and Blue Buffalo and I always come back to this. If they are given this and one of the other brands they will eat all of this first and they might not even eat the other. My vet always say that they are healthy during their yearly exams.
customer_reviews.author: RK

customer_reviews.title: They like it!
customer_reviews.text: This brand was originally suggested to me by a lady in Pet Supplies Plus. They offer regular versions, Indoor versions with garden greens, weight management versions, Chicken, Salmon... I usually have only one Max Cat open at a time. My guys have taken to them and seem to like whichever one best when they get it once or twice weekly rather than more often.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Foxmore

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this food and highly reccomend it! My four year old cat was looking very dull, and had some irritation on her skin-- like allergies or possibly a pest was biting her. I switched her food to Max CAT and literally she got rabbit soft, her fur got super shiny, and the irritation disappeared! This food is fabulous for both of my cats. I believe I save money as they are full faster, for longer than with food packed with fillers. I have not given them any other flavors-- just the salmon one.
customer_reviews.author: Lexxuz

customer_reviews.title: Pets like it but it's not grain free
customer_reviews.text: I've been feeding this to my ferret because she really likes it, it's not the worst, but I would prefer to find a grain free food for her. I did let my sick cat have it when he really needed some fattening up and was very picky and he loved it too!
customer_reviews.author: SarJo

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it
customer_reviews.text: I have some very picky felines! It is hard to find 1 type of dry food that they are all willing to eat. Blue...nope not 1 ate it... wellness a few tried it. But this they all love! They have been switched over to this for several months now and they are happy, so shiny& healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Andig73

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but maybe have to use smaller portions.
customer_reviews.text: We looked though several brands for my kitty girl Mandy and saw that this one had good nutritional value and not too expensive. I don't buy foods for my pets at grocery stores, it's just junk food for them. Unfortunately my little Mandy became a Max Mandy and now she's obese. I'm not putting a bad review because I know she loves to eat and maybe, for this brand, I should've have used smaller portions. Anyway, now she's going in a diet and I'm mixing the rest of the giant bag I've bought with a light calorie brand.
customer_reviews.author: Emmavk

customer_reviews.title: Not all cats like this food?
customer_reviews.text: I can’t speak for the actual food itself but my cat wouldn’t take to this. At all. She’d take out only her new food and leave it on the ground. A bit disappointing. Also the bag itself is not resealable so that surprised me a little bit. Be sure to have a bag clip or something on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: The food that saved our cat!
customer_reviews.text: All of our cats eat this food as it is food for cats, and our cats are indeed cats. Amazing how that works! In all seriousness, we have a very finicky 14-year-old diabetic cat who refuses to eat anything else. He was dead set on a different kibble when he just stopped eating in November 2015. We had a close call with hepatic lipidosis, and then he started eating this. I spent over $300 on various foods trying to find something he would eat, and this was the only one. So it's the only one!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Good food makes happy cats
customer_reviews.text: My two black cats are beautiful, and people ask what I feed them. This is the answer, along with Nutro wet food.
customer_reviews.author: paperbatty

customer_reviews.title: They seem to enjoy it
customer_reviews.text: Probably one of the few dry foods that my cats eat, anytime I would buy them really expensive food they eat it for a day or two then not touch it, this one I've been giving them for over few months now and they still enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Vadim Matsan

customer_reviews.title: and I believe it is safe to attribute that to the great nutrition this company provides in their foods compared to ...
customer_reviews.text: We have six cats. The entire herd loves this brand and it keeps hairballs and upset stomachs to a minimum. We recently rescued a persian cat and his new growth fur after shaving him down is miles above his tail and face that we didn't shave in terms of shine, softness and health. It was a very big noticeable change, and I believe it is safe to attribute that to the great nutrition this company provides in their foods compared to the bargain brands like "friskies", which is on par with Burger King if you were to ask me.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Happy healthy cat
customer_reviews.text: The only food my cat will eat. She is on her 15th year and is still going strong with great health. Occasionally I sprinkle tuna flakes on her food and she also has access to outside where bugs, birds and geckos are generally offered as a thank you 😻
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: cat cannot digest
customer_reviews.text: My cat started throwing up entire stomach fulls of undigested food. He ate this, missed with his older food, for about a week before I switched back to his previous food. The vomiting immediately stopped and his coat went back to normal (it had gotten dull and shedding increased).
customer_reviews.author: D. Blanton

customer_reviews.title: This is my cats favorite food right now!
customer_reviews.text: My cats get bored with the same food so I try new ones a lot. They are really loving this one. It has no bad smell either, like some dry foods do. The food is about 1/2 inch in diameter, and fairly thin, so my cats actually crunch into this instead of swallowing whole as they do with some foods. Hopefully that will help keep plaque from building up on their teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves Nutro Max Cat
customer_reviews.text: I had my cat originally on the Nutro Indoor Cat food, tan bag with purple and my cat loved that food. However that food went up about 10 bucks and I'm not spending 40 bucks on a 27lb bag of cat food. I found this stuff one day on ordering the other food, from the reviews cats like it. I had about 4lbs left over of the other brand so I just mixed it with the new bag. My cat prefers the new food over the old food, he doesn't even eat it. So now I feed the old food to the birds :D
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Wait, how do I judge flavor? LoL. I'm not trying it...
customer_reviews.text: The review asks you to rate flavor. I refuse to taste it, so I don't know. Ha. I've trusted this brand since it debuted.
customer_reviews.author: TheDisabledBeauty

customer_reviews.title: Came opened. Kudos to Amazon for Returning
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this food and I have had a hard time finding another food he likes. This bag came opened from the warehouse. Not sure if it was bad glue or got opened in shipping. 5 stars to Amazon for returning my money for this!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa A. Maurer

customer_reviews.title: Miracle Food
customer_reviews.text: My (almost) 9 year old loves this brand. I was really excited to find an adult indoor food. Marley is starting to slow down a little and I wanted to find her something that had less fats but still worked with her sensitive stomach; this was the answer. She loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Marie

customer_reviews.title: ... premium cat food to see which one my kitten liked best. Hands down it was this one
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 3 different kinds of premium cat food to see which one my kitten liked best. Hands down it was this one. You could tell by watching her eat that the larger pieces were easier for her to chew than the tiny little round crunchies. Thanks to the other reviewer, who prompted me to buy this brand. Good stuff in it too!
customer_reviews.author: ms.gowiths

customer_reviews.title: Our Kitten Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: Our new kitten loves this dry food! The shape is good for him to nibble on since he is suffering with mild juvenile gingivitis. Ordering the adult style for our older cats since I can’t keep them from eating the baby’s food!
customer_reviews.author: Nancianne

customer_reviews.title: Good for my kitty's tummy.
customer_reviews.text: This is the only brand of cat food my cat can eat without vomiting after. She has a super sensitive tummy, but she can eat this cat food with no problems afterwards. It's the only brand I buy for her now. She has been eating it happily for almost 10 years!
customer_reviews.author: Karme

customer_reviews.title: 6lb bag, not 16 lb bag as described.
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this food, but this is for a 6 lb bag, NOT a 16 lb bag as advertised. I normally purchase the 16 lb bag and at this price, I ordered 2. I received 2 6lb bags.
customer_reviews.author: Hillunlimited

customer_reviews.title: Cat food bag had been opened and lots of ants in it
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the cat food was open and spilled all in the box which was pretty banged up. When I opened the box in my kitchen hundreds of ants spilled out onto my kitchen floor which kinda sucks when you come home from work tired. I was able to salvage the other items in the box but had to throw out the cat food because of the ant infestation. I probably won’t by food items on amazon anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Johnson

customer_reviews.title: 16 pounds  means 16 pounds
customer_reviews.text: I 'm tired of trying to figure out Purina Complete's way of weighing 16 pounds ,wondering why those bags only lasted for a week or less. I tried this product a month ago, cats weren't too interested until they realized the choice wasn't theirs to make. I have 8 cats . With Purina Complete someone was always throwing up . Now I can actually go through a day or two without hearing that sound. And as I said these bags are full not half. My only worry is that one day I'll look on line to order and it will not be available at this great price
customer_reviews.author: teri wells

customer_reviews.title: My 10 year old cat started eating it and regrew ...
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old cat started eating it and regrew hair and is more active( if any cat 10 years old can be active) the kitten has grown into a shiny energetic , curious bundle of energy!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This has been discontinued
customer_reviews.text: This cat food has been discontinued. My cat really liked this food and we have been struggling to find something new that he will eat. I am hoping to find something as a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: A.K. W.

customer_reviews.title: Switched from IAMS due to allergic issues in 2 cats. This food has been good for 5+ years.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality cat food. Feeds two male orange cats, age 15. They used to eat IAMS, but developed allergic reactions so we switched to Nutro Max Cat. This is all they eat - no cat treats, no other cat food, no human food - exception is one cat likes tuna juice from the can. Occasionally, there will be throw up - 2-3 times per month, but that's expected with any cat. We have been using this food for roughly 5 years. Price fluctuates on amazon, but it's usually cheaper on amazon than at local pet stores.
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: Cat likes it
customer_reviews.text: Well, I don’t know how it tastes, but I do know our cat loves it and this is the only brand we buy. Happy cat.
customer_reviews.author: jeb

customer_reviews.title: Better digestion
customer_reviews.text: Our first cat (we now have 6, all adopted or rescued), was returned 3 times to the humane society because he had toxic gas. The smell was horrible. We started him on only this dry food and no more toxic fumes.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Calery

customer_reviews.title: Healthier alternative at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: We switched our cats over to this stuff several years ago when we decided that we wanted something healthier than the Purina brand food that they routinely threw up. The problem dramatically decreased when we switched them to the MAX CAT and they seem to love it. Plus with prime shipping and the subscribe n' save discount it's actually cheaper to have Amazon deliver it then it is to buy it at the local pet store.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Bags need better sealing.
customer_reviews.text: Bag is not sealed properly. One order was open and product had fallen all over the box. Second order was not sealed properly, but had'nt come out of the packaging. The cats like the product and you can tell that it is good for their fur.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My cat's favorite brand.
customer_reviews.text: Gave the high protein for finicky cats a 5 star rating as my cat loves it. However decided to give her a change and try Nutro Max Cat salmon flavor. Well I think she likes this even better. Gave her, her first bowl and she didn't stop eating until she finished almost her daily allowance. So pleased I discovered Nutro for my cat.
customer_reviews.author: Scottsdale AZ

customer_reviews.title: loves it
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't know about the flavor...? cat likes it tho. only dry food she likes.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAnonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great dry cat food for the price
customer_reviews.text: My cats are pretty picky about eating "good" food and this is about the healthiest I can get without them curling their noses up to it. They get super excited when I new fresh bag shows up. I have been buying this for years if not a decade and they have loved it. If I had to recommend a dry cat food, this is what I would suggest.
customer_reviews.author: Russ R.

customer_reviews.title: Best brand for our 'kids'
customer_reviews.text: This brand is our furry children's favorite. Usually buy chicken flavor, but because is the Corona Virus, could not find it anywhere, so decided on Seafood flavor and they love it.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Urinary Health benefits
customer_reviews.text: My boy cat had stones and $$$ vet bills and this is the only dry food (I give combination wet and dry, boy cats need wet too but dry keeps their teeth from falling out) I've found that he can eat without getting clogged up and screaming in pain. My vet recommended I buy an expensive other but no need, he is stone free 1 year and counting, and he is finicky too so it worked out fantastic. Salmon flavor is equally awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Fragilestitching

customer_reviews.title: Happy Cats Love NUTRO MAX CAT Senior Dry Cat Food
customer_reviews.text: As you can imagine, it is hard to find any single cat food brand that 5 cats like at the same time. We literally had bowls of dry food everywhere. My 5 senior cats actually seem to like the NUTRO MAX CAT Senior Dry Cat Food. They are eating less of their "wet" food and there seem to be fewer hairballs since we changed over to it. My husband is in charge of cleaning the litter boxes & he says that the cat poops are more compact & less stinky.
customer_reviews.author: Emma M

customer_reviews.title: Cats broke out in skin rashes. :(
customer_reviews.text: Though very small bites, the food is probably good, however, 2 of our 3 cats developed skin allergies immediately after they started eating it. One cat got so badly infected from scratching the rash that we just spent $332 at the vet yesterday to help him heal. The vet said "Toss the food and go back to Natural Balance." For out cats' health, that's what we're doing. Never had a problem before.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa A

customer_reviews.title: ) love it. 😎 Main selling point for me was ...
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this for almost 10 years. We supplement their Max Cat wet food with a little bit of this dry food every day (for their teeth). Both cats (and dogs!) love it. 😎 Main selling point for me was lack of animal byproducts.
customer_reviews.author: L. Grove

customer_reviews.title: After trying a lot this is my pick
customer_reviews.text: After about a year of trying everything from grain-free organic or holistic or dry freeze U name it all three of my adult cats enjoy this food very much cut back on one of them who had stomach and vomiting issues even
customer_reviews.author: Meadow Thorne

customer_reviews.title: Nutro Max Indoor Cat Adult Dry Food
customer_reviews.text: My almost 11 year old handsome boy loves this food. He has a very sensitive stomach but he has never had a problem with this food.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Rivers

customer_reviews.title: MAX enjoyment for cats of all stripes
customer_reviews.text: I am a hooman slave to eight rescued cats of all ages, health conditions, breeds and temperaments. Every cat overlord, fussy finicky eater and all, loves this food. There are no leftover morsels, the bits are in a rough doughnut shape that helps to provide a satisfying crunch and help to remove tartar, and the taste must be excellent to tempt everyone. The price is very reasonable for the quality ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: aek

customer_reviews.title: only food my cat would eat
customer_reviews.text: this is the only dry cat food my elderly cat eats... she has such a sensitive stomach & this stuff goes down and stays down
customer_reviews.author: Red Ginger

customer_reviews.title: Discontinued and disappointed
customer_reviews.text: My cat loved this food but it is now discontinued. He is a picky eater. We are working on getting him to eat the Nutro brand of another type.
customer_reviews.author: Babs

customer_reviews.title: NUTRO CAT DRY FOOD RECALL!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy the dry food for cats! There was a recall!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Collazo

customer_reviews.title: Strong smelling, not a low enough grain content for a sensitive kitty
customer_reviews.text: I have tried lots of 'high quality' foods... I have a cat that is grain sensitive, and if I don't feed him GF or nearly GF foods he pukes. A LOT. He pukes this stuff up 2-3 times a day... it's not working for what I need it for. I honestly just cannot afford the two that I have found work the best... and this stuff has quite the odor to it. I have a real good nose, and this is annoying to me just being in the same room with the feeding bowls. Technical quality of the food is pretty good for the price, but as I said, it's not what I need.
customer_reviews.author: YsLadyMN

customer_reviews.title: Good cat food - my cat loves it
customer_reviews.text: I buy this regularly for my elderly SIamese male and he does very well on it. He has IBS and has a tendency to gorge himself and then throw up. This cat food has a larger kibble and he has to chew it more often. It hasn't solved the problem but it helped. The cat food seems nutritionally superb. He has lots of energy, his eyes are bright, his coat is beautiful, and he's always looking for trouble :-).
customer_reviews.author: Pamelaattheriver

customer_reviews.title: Healthy cats
customer_reviews.text: I have two rescue cats, one 16 and one, well I don't know her age but she is a beautiful manx who came to me with injuries from a fight or abuse. Her digestion was very poor and in general was recovering from a major event. I am happy to say that after feeding Nutro Max Cat for about a year (one yr since she came to our door) she is in good health and is VERY active. My 16 yr old sleeps most of the time but is healthy and moves about very well for her age. I recommend this product to you.
customer_reviews.author: Loueez

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately makes my cat throw up
customer_reviews.text: I tried this cat food for a month and noticed that my cat started throwing up more often. It doesn't agree with her system. Might be okay for other cats, though. I wanted to try it because a friend said it was much higher quality than other foods I had been feeding my cats.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa L

customer_reviews.title: Long time user ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used this brand for years, changing the type with their age range changed. Their coats have always been very soft and shiny. Also, the kibble changes size as the cats age, giving them continued ability to be well nourished.
customer_reviews.author: J Davis

customer_reviews.title: Bag might have been not sealed well. Cat wouldn't touch the food.
customer_reviews.text: Cat would not eat this because it was a bad scent. The bag wasn't sealed very well. Usually the bags have a strong seal which has to be carefully opened. This bag popped open with little effort.
customer_reviews.author: Pen

customer_reviews.title: Your mileage may vary.
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves the taste, but it gives her some really gross stomach distress. Gave it to my roommates' cats, and they seem to be having the same issue. It's a shame, because my cat apparently really loves the flavor, and the non-senior version of this food didn't seem to give her these issues. Maybe it's just time for grain free forever for her.
customer_reviews.author: H. A.

customer_reviews.title: Safe Choice
customer_reviews.text: I like Nutro's product. I wanted to stop feeding my cat the old brand he ate after the euthanasia drug scare. I feel safe feeding my cat this food.
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: Not for my kitten
customer_reviews.text: This big baby did not like the flavor. Granted, she’s a super picky eater. My other kitten liked it the first few days and then avoided those kibble bits once I mixed it with another brand
customer_reviews.author: LucyKona

customer_reviews.title: Three cheers from my kitties
customer_reviews.text: Made the switch from Nutro Max Indoor food for kittens to this one and was very happy that my boys did not resist the change. They are very picky eaters, so I was a bit nervous, especially because I thought I had one more bag of the kitten food to mix this with. I gave this to them straight, no kitten chaser, and they took to it like champs!
customer_reviews.author: Jodi G.

customer_reviews.title: Great company, great food
customer_reviews.text: I've been feeding my cats Max Cat for years. Both are happy and healthy critters. My vet says that they're in perfect health because of this brand. The switch from the indoor adult line to the senior food was easy. I also fed my dog Nutro for years. Can't go wrong with this brand. I only wish this bag came in a slightly larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: It's just the best for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: You have a cat with problems putting on weight or keeping their food down this food is a must to try. I have used it in the past with cats that have stomach problems and it just works!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Mills

customer_reviews.title: Bring back NUTRO MAX!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: A little salty this line has been cancelled. My cats (ages 15, 12 and 11) have been eating it their entire lives and loved it. Why????
customer_reviews.author: Walkingthemoon

customer_reviews.title: My cat likes it!
customer_reviews.text: Finally a cat food that my cat will eat. No more just sitting there and staring at me as if to say; "That's it, 'all you have for me"?
customer_reviews.author: Robert Whitefeather

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a good choice so far. Out of 8 cats 8 seem to like it.
customer_reviews.author: KAT

customer_reviews.title: My cats love this
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this flavor. One of my cats does not care for dry food. But she will eat this one. I keep the dry food out in their bowl throughout the day for them and it takes approximately three days for them eat it all but with this dry food, it's gone within one day. Smell of this dry food smells like the trader joes' cat treats I buy for them and they love the cat treats. I would buy this again for them because they both love it. And I think I'll have to buy it for them way sooner rather than later.
customer_reviews.author: Layla

customer_reviews.title: Best Decision Ever!
customer_reviews.text: We switched our babies from a cheaper whatever is on sale food to Nutro Max because we received a bag as a trial from a friend who worked at a pet store. After seeing the difference there is no way we will buy them anything else now. Their coats are so much shinier and silky and their poop smells a lot less stinky than before. We buy it on Amazon for the price, free shipping with Prime, and we like not having to lug it home from the specialty pet stores. we buy our litter (Dr. Elsey's Precious Cat) on Amazon too. Our girls are happy and so are we!
customer_reviews.author: Sharpie

customer_reviews.title: Cate loves it
customer_reviews.text: Cannot comment on taste as my cat does not know how to type, but I'll guess it's pretty good since this is basically the only food he eats. Big bags are always a good value.
customer_reviews.author: mikebw

product_meta.title: Nutro MAX Dry Cat Food - All Life Stages, Chicken & Salmon
product_meta.description:
Style:Kitten| Flavor Name:Chicken| Size:3 lb.


NUTRO MAX CAT DRY KITTEN FOOD 
NUTRO MAX Dry Kitten Food is made using high-quality ingredients like real protein. Our special kitten formula is tailored to the nutritional needs of young cats to help support proper growth and development.

Playful, active kittens need food that can fuel their active lifestyles. NUTRO MAX Dry Kitten Food is the perfect solution. Formulated with essential nutrients to promote proper growth, this dry cat food will help your kitten grow up happy and healthy, at a price that’s easy on your wallet. 

A DRY CAT FOOD MADE SPECIFICALLY FOR YOUR KITTEN
All-natural ingredients make NUTRO MAX Dry Kitten Food a smart choice for pet parents looking to feed their pets the best. In addition to providing wholesome sustenance, NUTRO MAX Kitten Food is a natural cat food that provides a range of benefits to promote overall health.

KEY BENEFITS
• Natural Nutrition Maximum Health
Made with select ingredients and the vitamins and minerals cats need for optimum health and wellness.
• DHA and Antioxidants
Fortified to help brain development to keep your kitten alert, playful and trainable.
• Build Strong Muscles and Bones 
Provides ideal levels of protein, calcium and zinc formulated for proper kitten muscle growth and bone and teeth development.
• Digestive Health 
Natural fibers and easy-to-digest brewers rice.
• Healthy Skin & Coat
Rich in omega-6 fatty acids to support a healthy coat and skin. Fish oil, sunflower oil and soybean oil help support a shiny coat. 

AVAILABLE SIZES
• 3 pounds • 6 pounds • 16 pounds 

AVAILABLE FLAVORS
• Roasted Chicken 

click to view product NUTRO MAX CAT KITTEN WET CAT FOOD 
NUTRO MAX CAT Kitten Wet Cat Food provides a great taste and has a rich source of nutrients which support healthy growth and development. 

click to view product NUTRO MAX CAT ADULT WET CAT FOOD
NUTRO MAX Adult Wet Cat Food is a complete and balanced meal made with natural ingredients fortified with vitamins, minerals and other nutrients like real chicken slow-cooked in a savory broth.

click to view product NUTRO MAX CAT DRY SENIOR CAT FOOD
Created specifically to meet the needs of senior cats, NUTRO MAX CAT Dry Senior Cat Food contains nourishing natural ingredients fortified with vitamins, minerals and other nutrients for an irresistibly delicious taste.

click to view product NUTRO MAX CAT ADULT DRY CAT FOOD
NUTRO MAX CAT Adult Dry Cat food is made with select ingredients to support health and wellness with a great taste your cat will love.



AMAZON.COM
MAX CAT Kitten Food Roasted Chicken Flavor is made with select ingredients and the vitamins and minerals your cat needs for its health and wellness. With the taste of real chicken, your kitten will find MAX CAT products irresistible! Our healthy kitten foods provide rich sources of omega-6 and omega-3 fatty acids to help provide healthy skin and a shiny coat.
